file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged line uses requests.post to send data to an AWS Cognito endpoint (self.cognito_idp_url), but this is standard behavior for AWS Cognito authentication and device management flows. The data being sent includes authentication tokens, device keys, and related information, but only to the legitimate AWS Cognito service endpoint constructed from the pool_id. There is no evidence of exfiltration to unauthorized third-party servers or any attempt to leak sensitive data outside the expected AWS workflow. The code is a typical implementation of the Secure Remote Password (SRP) protocol for AWS Cognito and does not exhibit malicious intent.

detection_points.full_match: * This package is exfiltrating sensitive data to a remote server at pycognito-2024.5.1/pycognito/aws_srp.py:511
